00056 class ExceptionHandler
00057 {
00058    public:

00073 
00074      static void write(const char* c, ...);
00075      
00076      struct ModuleEntry
00077      {
00078           std::string imageName;
00079           std::string moduleName;
00080           DWORD baseAddress;  // Should be UINT_PTR?
00081           DWORD size;
00082      };
00083      typedef std::vector< ModuleEntry > ModuleList;
00084      typedef ModuleList::iterator ModuleListIter;
00085      
00086      static LONG WINAPI Filter( EXCEPTION_POINTERS *ep );

00089                                  HANDLE hProcess );

00092                                       HANDLE hProcess );

00096      // Variables used by the class
00097 
00098      // Make typedefs for some IMAGEHLP.DLL functions so that we can use them
00099      // with GetProcAddress
00100      typedef BOOL (__stdcall *tSC)( IN HANDLE hProcess );
00101      
00102      typedef PVOID (__stdcall *tSFTA)
00103      ( HANDLE hProcess, DWORD AddrBase );
00104      
00105      typedef BOOL (__stdcall *tSGLFA)
00106      ( IN HANDLE hProcess, IN DWORD dwAddr,
00107        OUT PDWORD pdwDisplacement, OUT PIMAGEHLP_LINE Line );
00108      
00109      typedef DWORD (__stdcall *tSGMB)( HANDLE, DWORD );
00110      
00111      typedef BOOL (__stdcall *tSGMI)
00112      ( IN HANDLE hProcess, IN DWORD dwAddr, OUT PIMAGEHLP_MODULE ModuleInfo );
00113      
00114      typedef DWORD (__stdcall *tSGO)( VOID );
00115      
00116      typedef BOOL (__stdcall *tSGSFA)
00117      ( IN HANDLE hProcess, IN DWORD dwAddr,
00118        OUT PDWORD pdwDisplacement, OUT PIMAGEHLP_SYMBOL Symbol );
00119      
00120      typedef BOOL (__stdcall * tSI)( HANDLE, LPSTR, BOOL );
00121      
00122      typedef DWORD (__stdcall *tSLM)
00123      ( IN HANDLE hProcess, IN HANDLE hFile,
00124        IN PSTR ImageName, IN PSTR ModuleName,
00125        IN DWORD BaseOfDll, IN DWORD SizeOfDll );
00126      
00127      typedef DWORD (__stdcall *tSSO)( IN DWORD SymOptions );
00128 
00129      typedef BOOL (__stdcall * tSW)
00130      ( DWORD, HANDLE, HANDLE, LPSTACKFRAME, LPVOID,
00131        PREAD_PROCESS_MEMORY_ROUTINE,PFUNCTION_TABLE_ACCESS_ROUTINE,
00132        PGET_MODULE_BASE_ROUTINE, PTRANSLATE_ADDRESS_ROUTINE );
